website_summaries.verdict: A wonderful treat for lactose-intolerant cats who otherwise love milk.
pros: Real low-fat, grade-A milk is the first ingredient
The added taurine, which promotes a healthy heart and eyes, is a great bonus
An excellent way to keep a cat hydrated
cons: Intended as a treat for kittens eight weeks and older

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement for my elderly cat and new kittens too!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very old cat that has a hard time getting enough to eat. He was leaving half of his pate cat food in the bowl so I now stir a couple tablespoons of Cat Sip into his food and he eats it all right up. Regular milk upset his stomach (most cats can't tolerate regular milk) but this stuff is gentle on my old guy and he loves it. A container will last him 3 or 4 days as I only feed him 2-3 Tbsps at a time. I have also used this to feed very young kittens that have been newly weaned from their mother. Regular milk is much to hard on their stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Delily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for old & young!!
customer_reviews.text: In keeping my 18 yr old cat healthy, added this to aid in his getting some nutrition & hydration. My vet has taught me how to give him subcutaneous fluids, and this is NOT a replacement for that level of need, but he enjoys it & seem to feel better for it. He's pampered beyond belief with chicken baby food with his powdered vitamins mix in. As long as he's happy & enjoying his meals & milk we keep on trucking! He likes his milk!
customer_reviews.author: BRITTSKATZ

customer_reviews.title: The cat's MEOW!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats are so persnickety they pretty much won't eat anything. Cat Sip is a HIT with our crew. We will either just give them a little for a snack or sometimes we mix it with canned cat food. This is not cat food, but a little supplement to give them extra hydration and calories. So glad I found this Cat Sip!
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoLover

customer_reviews.title: Try it out on your cat and see what happens
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a very finicky cat that we are temporarily caring for. After 7 days, the cat has never touched his bowl with this milk in it. But, he does eat all his food and drink his water. SO....it looks like this particular cat is not impressed. BUT then again, he doesn't react to catnip either. So as we haven't been able to try this out on a normal cat...we can't really judge it. All we can say...is give it a try anyway...YOUR cat might like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good treat for cats.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why Amazon ask to rate the flavor as my cats can't tell me but I guess since they like it I put 5 stars. I get this milk for my cats as an extra treat. The carton usually lasts about 3 days as they don't drink that much milk. I've ordered it multiple times. The only thing I'm not happy about is that received product is usually really close to expiration date. It's kind of pushing me to use it sooner than anticipated and not buy more than 2 cartons at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Nikol

customer_reviews.title: What a huge help!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't thank Amazon enough for selling these little boxes of kitty milk for so cheap! They are just perfect size! The K-Cup is there to show size LOL! My little guys just love this stuff and its really helping in the transition to regular cat food!! Such a huge help!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheina

customer_reviews.title: Way over priced
customer_reviews.text: Way over priced. It was my fault for misreading the description. Boy, i was sure disappointed when the box came and i realized that i had just paid $6.00 for one small box of cat milk. To make matters even worse, my cat won't drink it
customer_reviews.author: jfann

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised the rate features for this product asked for "Flavor", well I'm not the one drinking it so I asked my cats and they told me it's meowummy. Anyways, all 3 of my cats were stray kittens when I brought them home and grew up on KMR. I wanted something lowfat as a treat and found these. Although they do drink a lot of water, more liquid in their system helps in the longrun against UTIs. They took to it immediately and I'm a happy cat mama here.
customer_reviews.author: Souma

customer_reviews.title: Cat seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: Got this stuff to try and encourage my 15 year old diva cat to get more fluids in her and maybe gain some weight. She won't drink it by itself but if it's mixed with wet food she'll gobble it down. So she must like it for the most part. Because I just have her for a cat, like that I can refrigerate it for up to 7 days and don't have to use it all at once. Will probably purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Your cats will love this
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love milk, one day my older cat got sick from the regular milk. I was on the hunt. I was told about cat sip from a family vet. When we received it, opened it up gave both our cats their own dishes, gone in no time. My husband ordered six of them. One box did last us a week with 2 cats given every other day. We are going to be giving to the cats every month. Our older cat was becoming dehydrated, the vet recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My sweet kitty has a UTI issue and more moisture in her diet is crucial. Now, I can't make her drink water, but she does LOVE this milk! I've been feeding it to her every evening, about 2 tablespoons' worth and so far she has been just fine, no bladder issues. I'm not a veterinarian, but this really does seem to be working really well for her.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Loar

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats likes to drink the leftover milk in my cereal bowl. I figured that regular milk wasn't good for him, so I gave this a try. He loves it! He now asks for and gets a little bit every morning after he eats. I only give him about 1-2 ounces a day, and 1 box lasts me about a week. I think this helps keep him hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: EPTX88

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats 1 liked it the other didn't and I only got it because I wanted to put the dewormer in it. So that didn't work out I only tried it because someone said it worked for her cat so I thought I'd give it a try, but I'm sure this is great stuff probably meant for younger cats lol mine are 9 I'll be figuring something else out next.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa P.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Found this in our one of our local stores and tried it our cats loved it than checked on Amazon and it was a lot better priced so I am buying it here for our babies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nearly grown cats Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Normally we give canned milk to the cats, however, the canned milk even when diluted often gave them the squirts something awful. A friend told me about this Cat sip milk. so I decided to give it a try as a treat to them, and sure enough, neither of them had gotten the squirts, they also love the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Kitten crack lol
customer_reviews.text: my kitten loves this milk ❤️ She cant get enough
customer_reviews.author: Queen13

customer_reviews.title: shelf stable - great to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: This product is great to have on hand when your cat or kitten is feeling under the weather and needs a little coaxing to eat. Provides fluid and some nutrition ( it is not a complete meal replacement). Can be used alone or mixed with other food items. It is shelf stable unopened - once opened anything left in the carton needs to be refrigerated.
customer_reviews.author: VancouverWA

customer_reviews.title: My picky cats love this milk!
customer_reviews.text: Good value compared to other brands, my 2 cats only get a little bit every morning. Both seem to be satisfied with this product. It is a little difficult to pour, splashed everywhere, cut the other side/tip off to allow more air into the container, better flow.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great product and good for cats
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find this Catsip and so was my kitty! She loves it and it is difficult to find where I live. I only wish there was not a limit on how many you can order but I guess due to the low price. Very pleased and Pandora said thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treat
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is lactose free and has added taurine. From the very first time I gave some to my kitty she absolutely loves it. I read some reviewers said to warm it up to room temperature before serving but my kitty will only drink it cold. I only give her 1 ounce each morning as a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for nursing care
customer_reviews.text: We rescue this kitten from the street, he was only a couples weeks old, so the milk is very helpful. He still drinks it before bed time
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have four cats that absolutely love this. I use it as a treat, to supplement feedings when they are not eating or feeling well, or to help keep them hydrated during hot weather. I dilute it with water during warmer weather to encourage them to drink more water and they all lap it up!
customer_reviews.author: MemaLaura

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this stuff. I was worried about her fluid intake bc she was having some constipation issues. I was worried she was getting a little dehydrated. I found this on sale and I figured I would give it a try. She stands in front of the fridge and demands it several times a day. Her constipation issues and much better. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Medley

customer_reviews.title: Cat Doesn't Like
customer_reviews.text: My cat is not a fan of this milk product. She ate it, relunctly, for a few days then stopped eating it all together. Fortunately it was not expensive so I do not feel too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves it
customer_reviews.text: I took in a stray cat that was extremely skinny and unwell, and allergic to everything. I gave her this mixed in with grain free cat food, and she is doing so much better.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: The kitten said, "Yey!"
customer_reviews.text: We have a 4 week old feral kitten who showed up on our doorstep. The 14 year old was SURE that the kitten was in dire need of milk. I don't know if she needed it but she seemed enjoy it. Wish it came in bigger bottles.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bishop-Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Damaged..NOT returnable.
customer_reviews.text: The cat milk box came in a padded envelope ...the product box was damaged and the milk was leaking out ..it is NOT useable ..it is NOT returnable Amazon states... Do NOT buy..
customer_reviews.author: Kim A.

customer_reviews.title: My cat hated it.
customer_reviews.text: He would dart the other direction when I put it close to him, it was weird, but I figure that just meant something didn't smell right to him.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: Yorkie approved
customer_reviews.text: Our two Yorkie love this. We give them a little bit as a treat each day. I still wonder why the removed the label when it used to say “Dogs love it too!”
customer_reviews.author: Shawna S.

customer_reviews.title: Helps my old cat
customer_reviews.text: I’m a frequent and repeat buyer of this. My cat is 18 and extremely finicky when it comes to flavors. She loves this stuff! I mix it with her wet food. She’s old and deaf. She needs added calories anywhere I can fit them in. This is a lifesaver (literally) for her.
customer_reviews.author: L.J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing more than lactose free milk, but I like the small size. The cats LOVE it and it doesn't upset their stomachs.
customer_reviews.author: KMEMN

customer_reviews.title: Licked it right up
customer_reviews.text: I have a fussy cat that turns up her nose on most treats. She licked up 3 full tablespoons as soon as I opened it. Definitely will buy again....
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Bussell

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t order through mail
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged smelled like vomit was leaking all over . Amazon credited no problem
customer_reviews.author: SHABBYCABBAGEROSE

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: My fur baby Simba is so spoiled and he doesn't drink alot of water so I thought I would try this ..he took a sip but didn't really care for it. I guess time will tell ..but it is a great deal for the amount u get in each carton..
customer_reviews.author: claudette davis

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for the amount
customer_reviews.text: Some kitties like and some don't. Careful when opening. It spews all over the place. a little overpriced for the amount.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBlue

customer_reviews.title: Kiity Crack Corn...and they don't care
customer_reviews.text: My 19 year old cat cant get enough of this stuff as a treat. My 18 year old female doesn't seem to care for it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise the content itself is great!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves this treat! The only reason why I gave it 4 stars is because the packaging makes it hard to open (a lot of it spilled). Otherwise the content itself is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lin

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: My cat didn’t like it. It doesn’t look like “milk”. I’ll stick with the milk replacement Im used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlota Veras

customer_reviews.title: Carton leak
customer_reviews.text: Out of the 4 cartons of milk one was damaged and leaked all over the box it was shipped in I have ordered this before with no problems however items should be checked before shipping
customer_reviews.author: Lu Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love the price and my cat is so in love with this milk. I was hesitant to buy but no regrets. Great price! I made it last for four days! No bad symptoms on my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine G

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for kittens
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my kitten as a special treat. She absolutely loves it! Definitely will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith (Meri) Morse

customer_reviews.title: Helps avoid cat dehydration
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love this milk! I like to use it in the summer as it helps keep them from getting dehydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this product much because my cats have a bad stomach now. They kinda liked the taste but they didn't feel good afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Adil

customer_reviews.title: My cat said "no" about this product
customer_reviews.text: When I offered this product to my cat, she smelled it, tried and said "no". The smell is neutral, has yellow color like regular almond milk. So, I supposed to pour it out.
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger container and better price than the Whiskas brand from the store. Kitty loves it just as much.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wortman

customer_reviews.title: If your cat likes, good product
customer_reviews.text: My cat was not a fan. It was smaller than expected but for the price I guess I can’t complain
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bickham

customer_reviews.title: Junk, it's a lactose free milk pouch. I thought it was cat treats.
customer_reviews.text: Junk, it's a lactose free milk pouch. I thought it was cat treats.
customer_reviews.author: Buster Florida

customer_reviews.title: Cats love
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love it and get it as a treat once in a while
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Cats really love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats really love this milk and it's good for them it's a special treat but I only think it was a little bit high for small container so the price is really too high but it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Rostetter

customer_reviews.title: Glad my cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it! Been going crazy about it since it got delivered. Must be yummy for cats.
customer_reviews.author: Lira

customer_reviews.title: my cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing Cat Sip for almost a year now. My cats LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: Brianna R

customer_reviews.title: Paws Down
customer_reviews.text: My cats didn't like it. I have to say they are picky though.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love it
customer_reviews.text: we tried it for out two new kittens and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my cats love this I buy it as a treat and especially good if your cat is lactose intolerant.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Manzola

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Cat says the flavor is awesome. Much cheaper than in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better for cats than milk.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old Siamese/mix rescue cat loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Granhedda

customer_reviews.title: My picky cat LOVES this!!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has left many treat bowls full, thinking his taste is better than that. This is not one of those times. He licks the bowl clean. Scar absolutely loves this!! It’s such a nice treat for him. :)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal curry

customer_reviews.title: Adult cats love this
customer_reviews.text: My two six years old cats love it!!! Hopefully this can help them getting more water that they need.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: cat hooked
customer_reviews.text: my cat is hooked on this . I give her a little amount every am. She cries till she gets it.
customer_reviews.author: alice m sturm

customer_reviews.title: Cats absolutely love this
customer_reviews.text: I have four picky cats and Allllll off them love it
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Better than a pet store
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it! What I do is place them in the fridge and just pour it in a bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Leandra

customer_reviews.title: Mattie's favorite
customer_reviews.text: I tried many cat milks for my cat. She loved this one.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie P.

customer_reviews.title: Good treat for kitties
customer_reviews.text: My cats love my cereal milk but I know it's not good for them so I got this! They love it. I said 5 stars on the flavor but I've never tasted it lol! It's a little treat I give them once in awhile and the price is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kitties love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old girl loves this and it doesn’t hurt her tummy! My younger ones love it too. But this milk is the only “treat” my older girl loves
customer_reviews.author: Erin brasher

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kitty
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves this stuff! It has helped her put back on some weight after! Definitely gonna continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Vincent didnt like at first
customer_reviews.text: I put a bowl of this down and my little boy cat wouldn't touch it. Well once I mixed it in with his food, he loved it. I think it is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Hardy

customer_reviews.title: My pet cat loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves this stuff! Your pet cat only needs a little at a time, so I was able to make one carton last a good week and a half : )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product, the cats seem to love it
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product, the cats seem to love it! The only thing that was a bit different than I though, was the consistency of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Priced just right 🤗
customer_reviews.text: My 12 week old kitten loves this milk and the price is just right ;).
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Angel

customer_reviews.title: It's a good supplement
customer_reviews.text: My cat's loves Cat sip. When they want eat we give it to them with a supplement for weight gain. It's wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Fannie Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Cat thinks it's tasty
customer_reviews.text: I don't "love" it, but my cat definitely does. He laps this stuff right up.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: My cats loved this!
customer_reviews.text: I have four cats, ranging from kitten to 2 years old and they went nuts over this! I’ll definitely be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Smith

customer_reviews.title: If your cat loves dairy, check this out.
customer_reviews.text: My girl cat LOVES dairy. Insanely so. She loved this product and I cannot be out of it. The only thing that surprises me is that Amazon charges the most for it.
customer_reviews.author: LKA

customer_reviews.title: ... did not do well drinking this even though he liked the taste of it
customer_reviews.text: Cat did not do well drinking this even though he liked the taste of it. It caused him to have the runs really bad. However, he is sick so I do not know if it was the milk or my cat or both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cat Sip Real Milk Treat For Cats And Kittens, 8 Oz
product_meta.description: CatSip is made from Grade A low fat milk that’s 99 percent lactosefree, making it easier to digest for cats and kittens. Unlike solid treats, it also helps provide the added hydration they need.
feature_bullets: Contains Taurine, An Essential Nutrient For Cat Eye And Heart Health.
A Wholesome Snack Cats And Kittens Will Enjoy Every Day.
